name: Nidoran M

ability.name: Poison Point
ability.effect: When Nidoran M takes damage, flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is Poisoned.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 cards with Nido in their name. Reveal them to your opponent, add them to your hand, and shuffle your deck.

flavor: You donâ€™t turn your back on family, even when they do.
